code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';export var dataSlice=createSlice({name:'data',initialState:{overlay:false,commentId:0,replyId:0},reducers:{toggleOverlay:function toggleOverlay(state,action){console.log('from redux',state,action);state.overlay=action.payload;},setCommentId:function setCommentId(state,action){state.commentId=action.payload;},setReplyId:function setReplyId(state,action){state.replyId=action.payload;}}});var _dataSlice$actions=dataSlice.actions,toggleOverlay=_dataSlice$actions.toggleOverlay,setCommentId=_dataSlice$actions.setCommentId,setReplyId=_dataSlice$actions.setReplyId;export{toggleOverlay,setCommentId,setReplyId};export var selectOverlay=function selectOverlay(state){return state.data.overlay;};export var selectCommentId=function selectCommentId(state){return state.data.commentId;};export var selectReplyId=function selectReplyId(state){return state.data.replyId;};export default dataSlice.reducer;
